01:30:24";s:8:"datetime";s:19:"2024-09-07 16:36:29";}i:6;O:8:"stdClass":7:{s:16:"microsite_theme_id";s:1:"6";s:4:"name";s:7:"Zermatt";s:8:"settings";O:8:"stdClass":6:{s:10:"additional";O:8:"stdClass":2:{s:10:"custom_css";s:193:"#snowfall-element {
	position: fixed;
	top: 0;
	left: 0;
	width: 100vw;
	height: 100vh;
	pointer-events: none;
	z-index: 0; /* Not too negative this time */
	background: transparent;
}";s:9:"custom_js";s:1976:"<script>
const snowfall = {};

// Automatically create and insert the canvas element just after <body>
snowfall.canvas = document.createElement("canvas");
snowfall.canvas.id = "snowfall-element";
document.documentElement.appendChild(snowfall.canvas); // Append to <html>

// Continue as before
snowfall.context = snowfall.canvas.getContext("2d");

// Snowflake constructor
snowfall.snowflake = function () {
	this.size = Math.random() * 2 + 2;
	this.x = (Math.random() * snowfall.canvas.width - this.size - 1) + this.size + 1;
	this.baseX = this.x;
	this.distance = Math.random() * 50 + 1;
	this.opacity = Math.random();
	this.radians = Math.random() * Math.PI * 2;
	this.fall_speed = Math.random() * 1.5 + 0.5;
	this.y = (Math.random() * snowfall.canvas.height - this.size - 1) + this.size + 1;
	this.draw = () => {
		if(this.y > snowfall.canvas.height + this.size) {
			this.y = -this.size;
		} else {
			this.y += this.fall_speed;
		}
		this.radians += 0.02;
		this.x = this.baseX + this.distance * Math.sin(this.radians);
		snowfall.context.fillStyle = `rgba(255,255,255,${this.opacity})`;
		snowfall.context.fillRect(this.x, this.y, this.size, this.size);
	};
};

// Initial setup function
snowfall.setup = () => {
	snowfall.canvas.width = snowfall.context.canvas.clientWidth;
	snowfall.canvas.height = snowfall.context.canvas.clientHeight;
	snowfall.flakes = [];
	const flake_count = Math.ceil((snowfall.canvas.width * snowfall.canvas.height) / 12000);
	for (let i = 0; i < flake_count; i++) {
		snowfall.flakes.push(new snowfall.snowflake());
	}
};

window.addEventListener("resize", snowfall.setup);

// Animation loop function
snowfall.animate = () => {
	requestAnimationFrame(snowfall.animate);
	snowfall.context.clearRect(0, 0, snowfall.canvas.width, snowfall.canvas.height);
	for (let snowflake of snowfall.flakes) {
		snowflake.draw();
	}
};

// Let it snow!
snowfall.setup();
snowfall.animate();</script>";}s:7:"microsite";O:8:"stdClass":11:{s:15:"background_type";s:5:"image";s:10:"background";s:37:"78564ffadd816470639d7f68149ee338.webp";s:20:"background_color_one";N;s:20:"background_color_two";N;s:4:"font";s:5:"karla";s:9:"font_size";s:2:"16";s:15:"background_blur";i:2;s:21:"background_brightness";i:100;s:5:"width";i:8;s:13:"block_spacing";i:2;s:15:"hover_animation";s:6:"smooth";}s:13:"microsite_block";O:8:"stdClass":12:{s:10:"text_color";s:7:"#ffffff";s:17:"description_color";s:7:"#FFF0F0";s:16:"background_color";s:7:"#02343B";s:12:"border_width";s:1:"1";s:12:"border_color";s:9:"#FFFFFF4A";s:13:"border_radius";s:7:"rounded";s:12:"border_style";s:5:"solid";s:22:"border_shadow_offset_x";s:1:"0";s:22:"border_shadow_offset_y";s:1:"0";s:18:"border_shadow_blur";s:2:"20";s:20:"border_shadow_spread";s:1:"0";s:19:"border_shadow_color";s:9:"#00000010";}s:21:"microsite_block_socials";O:8:"stdClass":3:{s:5:"color";s:9:"#FFFFFFBA";s:16:"background_color";s:9:"#228694A1";s:13:"border_radius";s:7:"rounded";}s:23:"microsite_block_paragraph";O:8:"stdClass":1:{s:10:"text_color";s:9:"#FFFFFFD9";}s:21:"microsite_block_heading";O:8:"stdClass":1:{s:10:"text_color";s:7:"#FFFFFF";}}s:10:"is_enabled";s:1:"1";s:5:"order";s:1:"6";s:13:"last_datetime";s:19:"2025-03-25 01:31:19";s:8:"datetime";s:19:"2025-03-23 04:31:05";}i:7;O:8:"stdClass":7:{s:16:"microsite_theme_id";s:1:"7";s:4:"name";s:7:"Seattle";s:8:"settings";O:8:"stdClass":6:{s:10:"additional";O:8:"stdClass":2:{s:10:"custom_css";s:0:"";s:9:"custom_js";s:1481:"<script>
    const computed_styles = getComputedStyle(document.body);

    const original_background_image = computed_styles.backgroundImage;
    const original_background_size = computed_styles.backgroundSize;
    const original_background_position = computed_styles.backgroundPosition;
    const original_background_repeat = computed_styles.backgroundRepeat;

    const rain_images = [
        `url('${site_url}themes/altum/assets/images/microsites/rain.svg')`,
        `url('${site_url}themes/altum/assets/images/microsites/rain.svg')`,
        `url('${site_url}themes/altum/assets/images/microsites/rain.svg')`
    ];

    const rain_sizes = ['60%', '45%', '30%'];
    const rain_positions = ['left top', 'center top', 'center top'];
    const rain_repeats = ['repeat', 'repeat', 'repeat'];

    const all_images = rain_images.concat(original_background_image);
    const all_sizes = rain_sizes.concat(original_background_size);
    const all_positions = rain_positions.concat(original_background_position);
    const all_repeats = rain_repeats.concat(original_background_repeat);

    document.body.style.setProperty('background-image', all_images.join(', '));
    document.body.style.setProperty('background-size', all_sizes.join(', '), 'important');
    document.body.style.setProperty('background-position', all_positions.join(', '), 'important');
    document.body.style.setProperty('background-repeat', all_repeats.join(', '), 'important');
</script>";}s:7:"microsite";O:8:"stdClass":11:{s:15:"background_type";s:5:"image";s:10:"background";s:37:"25b10743f5d934e70250ffd557cee0a6.webp";s:20:"background_color_one";N;s:20:"background_color_two";N;s:4:"font";s:11:"inconsolata";s:9:"font_size";s:2:"16";s:15:"background_blur";i:2;s:21:"background_brightness";i:100;s:5:"width";i:8;s:13:"block_spacing";i:2;s:15:"hover_animation";s:6:"smooth";}s:13:"microsite_block";O:8:"stdClass":12:{s:10:"text_color";s:7:"#ffffff";s:17:"description_color";s:7:"#ffffff";s:16:"background_color";s:9:"#000000B5";s:12:"border_width";s:1:"0";s:12:"border_color";s:0:"";s:13:"border_radius";s:8:"straight";s:12:"border_style";s:5:"solid";s:22:"border_shadow_offset_x";s:1:"0";s:22:"border_shadow_offset_y";s:1:"0";s:18:"border_shadow_blur";s:2:"20";s:20:"border_shadow_spread";s:1:"0";s:19:"border_shadow_color";s:9:"#00000010";}s:21:"microsite_block_socials";O:8:"stdClass":3:{s:5:"color";s:7:"#ffffff";s:16:"background_color";s:9:"#00000000";s:13:"border_radius";s:7:"rounded";}s:23:"microsite_block_paragraph";O:8:"stdClass":1:{s:10:"text_color";s:7:"#5DC5D5";}s:21:"microsite_block_heading";O:8:"stdClass":1:{s:10:"text_color";s:7:"#FFFFFF";}}s:10:"is_enabled";s:1:"1";s:5:"order";s:1:"7";s:13:"last_datetime";s:19:"2025-03-25 06:24:02";s:8:"datetime";s:19:"2025-03-25 04:39:59";}i:8;O:8:"stdClass":7:{s:16:"microsite_theme_id";s:1:"8";s:4:"name";s:5:"Kyoto";s:8:"settings";O:8:"stdClass":6:{s:10:"additional";O:8:"stdClass":2:{s:10:"custom_css";s:0:"";s:9:"custom_js";s:177:"<script>

</script>";}s:7:"microsite";O:8:"stdClass":11:{s:15:"background_type";s:5:"image";s:10:"background";s:37:"0fc5e5a6b52b9d58ffc6ecfb112c76df.webp";s:20:"background_color_one";N;s:20:"background_color_two";N;s:4:"font";s:7:"default";s:9:"font_size";s:2:"16";s:15:"background_blur";i:3;s:21:"background_brightness";i:100;s:5:"width";i:8;s:13:"block_spacing";i:2;s:15:"hover_animation";s:6:"smooth";}s:13:"microsite_block";O:8:"stdClass":12:{s:10:"text_color";s:7:"#ffffff";s:17:"description_color";s:7:"#ffffff";s:16:"background_color";s:9:"#BC5101ED";s:12:"border_width";s:1:"1";s:12:"border_color";s:0:"";s:13:"border_radius";s:7:"rounded";s:12:"border_style";s:5:"solid";s:22:"border_shadow_offset_x";s:1:"0";s:22:"border_shadow_offset_y";s:1:"0";s:18:"border_shadow_blur";s:2:"20";s:20:"border_shadow_spread";s:1:"0";s:19:"border_shadow_color";s:9:"#00000010";}s:21:"microsite_block_socials";O:8:"stdClass":3:{s:5:"color";s:7:"#FFE8C0";s:16:"background_color";s:9:"#0000007D";s:13:"border_radius";s:5:"round";}s:23:"microsite_block_paragraph";O:8:"stdClass":1:{s:10:"text_color";s:7:"#FFFFFF";}s:21:"microsite_block_heading";O:8:"stdClass":1:{s:10:"text_color";s:7:"#FFFFFF";}}s:10:"is_enabled";s:1:"1";s:5:"order";s:1:"8";s:13:"last_datetime";s:19:"2025-03-26 02:46:32";s:8:"datetime";s:19:"2025-03-26 02:20:40";}}s:1:"g";a:0:{}s:1:"e";O:8:"DateTime":3:{s:4:"date";s:26:"2025-06-28 09:15:56.311858";s:13:"timezone_type";i:3;s:8:"timezone";s:3:"UTC";}s:1:"m";N;s:1:"c";N;}
